sentences.text: Our operations and financial results are subject to various risks and uncertainties, including those described below , which could adversely affect our business, financial condition, results of operations, cash flows, and the trading price of our common and capital stock..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Risks Related to Our Business and Industry We face intense competition..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: If we do not continue to innovate and provide products and services that are useful to users, we may not remain competitive, and our revenues and operating results could be adversely affected..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Our business is rapidly evolving, intensely competitive, and is subject to changing technologies, shifting user needs, and frequent introductions of new products and services..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Competing successfully depends heavily on our ability to rapidly deliver innovative products and technologies to the marketplace and provide products and services that make our search results and ads relevant and useful for our users..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: As our business has evolved, the competitive pressure to innovate will now encompass a wider range of products and services, including products and services that may be outside of our historical core business..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: We have many competitors in different industries, including general purpose search engines and information services, vertical search engines and e-commerce websites, social networks, providers of online products and services, other forms of advertising and online advertising platforms and networks, other operating systems, and wireless mobile device companies..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Our current and potential domestic and international competitors range from large and established companies to emerging start-ups..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Established companies have longer operating histories and more established relationships with customers and users, and they can use their experience and resources in ways that could affect our competitive position, including by making acquisitions, continuing to invest heavily in research and development, aggressively initiating intellectual property claims (whether or not meritorious), and continuing to compete aggressively for advertisers and websites..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Emerging start-ups may be able to innovate and provide products and services faster than we can or may foresee the consumer need for products and services before us.7Our competitors are constantly developing innovations in search, online advertising, wireless mobile devices, operating systems, and many other web-based products and services..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: The research and development of new, technologically advanced products is also a complex and uncertain process requiring high levels of innovation and investment, as well as the accurate anticipation of technology , market trends, and consumer needs..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: As a result, we must continue to invest significant resources in research and development, including through acquisitions, in order to enhance our search technology and our existing products and services, and introduce new products and services that people can easily and effectively use..
sentences.label: negative

sentences.text: If we are unable to provide quality products and services, then acceptance rates for our products and services could decline..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: In addition, these new products and services may present new and difficult technological and legal challenges, and we may be subject to claims if users of these offerings experience service disruptions or failures or other issues..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Our operating results would also suffer if our innovations are not responsive to the needs of our users, advertisers, and Google Network Members, are not appropriately timed with market opportunities, or are not effectively brought to market..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: As technology continues to develop, our competitors may be able to offer user experiences that are, or that are seen to be, substantially similar to or better than ours..
sentences.label: negative

sentences.text: This may force us to compete in different ways and expend significant resources in order to remain competitive..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: If our competitors are more successful than we are in developing compelling products or in attracting and retaining users, advertisers, and content providers, our revenues and operating results could be adversely affected..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Our ongoing investment in new businesses and new products, services, and technologies is inherently risky , and could disrupt our ongoing businesses..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: We have invested and expect to continue to invest in new businesses, products, services, and technologies..
sentences.label: negative

sentences.text: Such endeavors may involve significant risks and uncertainties, including distraction of management from current operations, insuf ficient revenues from such investments to offset liabilities assumed and expenses associated with these new investments, inadequate return of capital on our investments, and unidentified issues not discovered in our due diligence of such strategies and offerings that could cause us to fail to realize the anticipated benefits of such investments and incur unanticipated liabilities..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Because these new ventures are inherently risky, no assurance can be given that such strategies and offerings will be successful and will not adversely affect our reputation, financial condition, and operating results..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: More people are using devices other than desktop computers to access the Internet and accessing new devices to make search queries..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: If manufacturers and users do not widely adopt versions of our search technology , products, or operating systems developed for these devices, our business could be adversely affected..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: The number of people who access the Internet through devices other than desktop computers, including mobile phones, smartphones, handheld computers such as netbooks and tablets, video game consoles, and television settop devices, is increasing dramatically ..
sentences.label: negative

sentences.text: The functionality and user experience associated with some alternative devices make the use of our products and services through such devices more difficult (or just different) and the versions of our products and services developed for these devices may not be compelling to users, manufacturers, or distributors of alternative devices..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Each manufacturer or distributor may establish unique technical standards for its devices, and our products and services may not work or be viewable on these devices as a result..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Some manufacturers may also elect not to include our products on their devices..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: In addition, search queries are increasingly being undertaken via “apps” tailored to particular devices or social media platforms, which could affect our search and advertising business over time..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: As new devices and platforms are continually being released, it is difficult to predict the problems we may encounter in adapting our products and services and developing competitive new products and services..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: We expect to continue to devote significant resources to the creation, support, and maintenance of products and services across multiple platforms and devices..
sentences.label: negative

sentences.text: If we are unable to attract and retain a substantial number of alternative device manufacturers, distributors, developers, and users to our products and services, or if we are slow to develop products and technologies that are more compatible with alternative devices and platforms, we will fail to capture the opportunities available as consumers and advertisers transition to a dynamic, multi-screen environment..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: We generate a significant portion of our revenues from advertising, and a reduction in spending by or loss of advertisers could seriously harm our business..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: We generated 89% of Google revenues from our advertisers in 2014..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Our advertisers can generally terminate their contracts with us at any time..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Advertisers will not continue to do business with us if their investment in advertising with us does not generate sales leads or brand awareness, and ultimately customers, or if we do not deliver their advertisements in an efficient and effective manner ..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: If we are unable to remain competitive and provide value to our advertisers, they may stop placing ads with us, which would adversely affect our revenues and business.8In addition, expenditures by advertisers tend to be cyclical, reflecting overall economic conditions and budgeting and buying patterns..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Adverse macroeconomic conditions can also have a material negative impact on the demand for advertising and cause our advertisers to reduce the amounts they spend on advertising, which could adversely affect our revenues and business..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Our revenue growth rate could decline over time, and we anticipate downward pressure on our operating margin in the future..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Our revenue growth rate could decline over time as a result of a number of factors, including as a result of: • increasing competition, • changes in property mix, platform mix, and geographical mix, • the challenges in maintaining our growth rate as our revenues increase to higher levels, • the evolution of the online advertising market, including the increasing variety of online platforms for advertising, and the other markets in which we participate, and • the rate of user adoption of our products, services, and technologies..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: We believe our operating margin will experience downward pressure as a result of increasing competition and increased expenditures for many aspects of our business..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: For instance, our operating margin will experience downward pressure if a greater percentage of our revenues comes from ads placed on our Google Network Members’ websites compared to revenues generated through ads placed on Google websites or if we spend a proportionately larger amount to promote the distribution of certain products..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: The margin on revenues we generate from our Google Network Members is significantly less than the margin on revenues we generate from advertising on Google websites..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Also, the margin on the sale of digital content and apps, advertising revenues from mobile devices and newer advertising formats are generally less than the margin on revenues we generate from advertising on our websites on traditional formats..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Additionally , the margin we earn on revenues generated from our Google Network Members could decrease in the future if we pay an even larger percentage of advertising fees to our Google Network Members..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: We are subject to increased regulatory scrutiny that may negatively impact our business..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: The growth of our company and our expansion into a variety of new fields involve a variety of new regulatory issues, and we have experienced increased regulatory scrutiny as we have grown..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: For instance, several regulatory agencies have sought to review our search and other businesses on potential competition concerns..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: We continue to cooperate with the European Commission (EC) and other regulatory authorities around the world in investigations they are conducting with respect to our business and its impact on competition..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Legislators and regulators may make legal and regulatory changes, or interpret and apply existing laws, in ways that make our products and services less useful to our users, require us to incur substantial costs, expose us to unanticipated civil or criminal liability , or cause us to change our business practices..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: These changes or increased costs could negatively impact our business and results of operations in material ways..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: We are regularly subject to claims, suits, government investigations, and other proceedings that may result in adverse outcomes..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: We are regularly subject to claims, suits, and government investigations involving competition, intellectual property , privacy , consumer protection, tax, labor and employment, commercial disputes, content generated by our users, goods and services offered by advertisers or publishers using our platforms, and other matters..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: The sale of hardware products also exposes us to the risk of product liability and other litigation involving assertions about product defects, as well as health and safety , hazardous materials usage, and other environmental concerns..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: In addition, our businesses face intellectual property litigation, as further discussed later, that exposes us to the risk of exclusion and cease and desist orders, which could limit our ability to sell products and services..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Such claims, suits, and government investigations are inherently uncertain and their results cannot be predicted with certainty ..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Regardless of the outcome, any of these types of legal proceedings can have an adverse impact on us because of legal costs, diversion of management resources, and other factors..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Determining reserves for our pending litigation is a complex, fact-intensive process that requires significant judgment..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: It is possible that a resolution of one 9or more such proceedings could result in substantial fines and penalties that could adversely affect our business, consolidated financial position, results of operations, or cash flows in a particular period..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: These proceedings could also result in reputational harm, criminal sanctions, consent decrees, or orders preventing us from offering certain features, functionalities, products, or services, requiring a change in our business practices or product recalls or other field action, or requiring development of non-infringing or otherwise altered products or technologies..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Any of these consequences could adversely affect our business and results of operations..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Acquisitions could result in operating difficulties, dilution, and other consequences that may adversely impact our business and results of operations..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Acquisitions are an important element of our overall corporate strategy and use of capital, and these transactions could be material to our financial condition and results of operations..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: We expect to continue to evaluate and enter into discussions regarding a wide array of potential strategic transactions..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: The process of integrating an acquired company , business, or technology has created, and will continue to create, unforeseen operating difficulties and expenditures..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: The areas where we face risks include: • Diversion of management time and focus from operating our business to acquisition integration challenges..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Failure to successfully further develop the acquired business or technology ..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Implementation or remediation of controls, procedures, and policies at the acquired company ..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Integration of the acquired company's accounting, human resource, and other administrative systems, and coordination of product, engineering, and sales and marketing functions..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Transition of operations, users, and customers onto our existing platforms..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Failure to obtain required approvals on a timely basis, if at all, from governmental authorities, or conditions placed upon approval, under competition laws which could, among other things, delay or prevent us from completing a transaction, or otherwise restrict our ability to realize the expected financial or strategic goals of an acquisition or investment..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: • In the case of foreign acquisitions, the need to integrate operations across different cultures and languages and to address the particular economic, currency , political, and regulatory risks associated with specific countries..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Cultural challenges associated with integrating employees from the acquired company into our organization, and retention of employees from the businesses we acquire..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Liability for activities of the acquired company before the acquisition, including patent and trademark infringement claims, privacy issues, violations of laws, commercial disputes, tax liabilities, and other known and unknown liabilities..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Litigation or other claims in connection with the acquired company , including claims from terminated employees, customers, former stockholders, or other third parties..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Our failure to address these risks or other problems encountered in connection with our past or future acquisitions and investments could cause us to fail to realize the anticipated benefits of such acquisitions or investments, incur unanticipated liabilities, and harm our business generally ..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Our acquisitions could also result in dilutive issuances of our equity securities, the incurrence of debt, contingent liabilities, or amortization expenses, or impairment of goodwill and/or purchased long-lived assets, and restructuring charges, any of which could harm our financial condition or results..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Also, the anticipated benefits or value of our acquisitions or investments may not materialize..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Our business depends on a strong brand, and failing to maintain and enhance our brand would hurt our ability to expand our base of users, advertisers, Google Network Members, and other partners..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: 10Our strong brand has significantly contributed to the success of our business..
sentences.label: negative

sentences.text: Maintaining and enhancing our brand increases our ability to enter new categories and launch new and innovative products that better serve the needs of our users..
sentences.label: negative

sentences.text: Our brand may be negatively impacted by a number of factors, including, among others, reputational issues and product/technical performance failures..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Further , if we fail to maintain and enhance equity in the Google brand, our business, operating results, and financial condition may be materially and adversely affected..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Maintaining and enhancing our brand will depend largely on our ability to remain a technology leader and continue to provide highquality , innovative products and services that are truly useful and play a meaningful role in people’ s everyday lives..
sentences.label: negative

sentences.text: A variety of new and existing laws could subject us to claims or otherwise harm our business..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: We are subject to numerous U.S..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: and foreign laws and regulations covering a wide variety of subject matters..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: New laws and regulations (or new interpretations of existing laws and regulations) may also impact our business..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: For example, current and new patent laws such as U.S..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: patent laws and European patent laws may affect the ability of companies, including us, to protect their innovations and defend against claims of patent infringement..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: The costs of compliance with these laws and regulations are high and are likely to increase in the future..
sentences.label: negative

sentences.text: Claims have been, or may be, threatened and filed against us under both U.S..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: and foreign laws for defamation, invasion of privacy and other tort claims, unlawful activity , patent, copyright and trademark infringement, product liability , or other theories based on the nature and content of the materials searched and the ads posted by our users, our products and services, or content generated by our users..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Furthermore, many of these laws do not contemplate or address the unique issues raised by a number of our new businesses, products, services and technologies..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: In addition, the applicability and scope of these laws, as interpreted by the courts, remain uncertain..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: For example, the laws relating to the liability of providers of online services are currently unsettled both within the U.S..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: In addition, other laws that could subject us to claims or otherwise harm our business include: • The Digital Millennium Copyright Act, which has provisions that limit in the U.S., but do not necessarily eliminate, our liability for caching or hosting, or for listing or linking to, third-party websites that include materials that infringe copyrights or other rights, so long as we comply with the statutory requirements of this act..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Any future legislation impacting these safe harbors may adversely impact us..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: • Court decisions such as the ‘right to be forgotten’ ruling issued by the European court, which allows individuals to demand that Google remove search results about them in certain instances, may limit the content we can show to our users..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: and international laws that restrict the distribution of materials considered harmful to children and impose additional restrictions on the ability of online services to collect information from minors..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Data protection, laws passed by many states that require notification to users when there is a security breach for personal data, such as California’ s Information Practices Act..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: We face similar risks and costs overseas as our products and services are offered in international markets and may be subject to additional regulations..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Any failure on our part to comply with these laws and regulations can result in negative publicity and diversion of management time and effort and may subject us to significant liabilities and other penalties..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: We are, and may in the future be, subject to intellectual property or other claims, which are costly to defend, could result in significant damage awards, and could limit our ability to use certain technologies in the future..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Internet, technology , media, and other companies own large numbers of patents, copyrights, trademarks, and trade secrets and frequently enter into litigation based on allegations of infringement or other violations of intellectual property rights..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: In addition, patent holding companies may continue to seek to monetize patents they have purchased or otherwise obtained..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: As we have grown, the intellectual property rights claims against us have increased and may continue to increase as we develop new products, services, and technologies..
sentences.label: negative

sentences.text: We have had patent, copyright, and trademark infringement lawsuits filed against us claiming that certain of our products, services, and technologies infringe the intellectual property rights of others..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Third parties have also sought broad injunctive relief against us by filing claims in U.S..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: and international courts and the U.S..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: International Trade Commission (ITC) for exclusion and cease and desist orders, which could limit our ability to sell our products or services 11in the U.S..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: or elsewhere if our products or services or those of our customers or suppliers are found to infringe the intellectual property subject to the claims..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Adverse results in any of these lawsuits may include awards of substantial monetary damages, costly royalty or licensing agreements (if licenses are available at all), or orders preventing us from offering certain features, functionalities, products, or services, and may also cause us to change our business practices, and require development of non-infringing products or technologies, which could result in a loss of revenues for us and otherwise harm our business..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Furthermore, in connection with our divestitures, we have agreed, and may in the future agree, to provide indemnification for certain potential liabilities..
sentences.label: negative

sentences.text: In addition, many of our agreements with our customers and partners, including certain suppliers, require us to indemnify them for certain intellectual property infringement claims against them, which could increase our costs as a result of defending such claims, and may require that we pay significant damages if there were an adverse ruling in any such claims..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Such customers and partners may also discontinue the use of our products, services, and technologies, as a result of injunctions or otherwise, which could result in loss of revenues and adversely impact our business..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Moreover , intellectual property indemnities provided to us by our suppliers, when obtainable, may not cover all damages and losses suffered by us and our customers from covered products..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Regardless of the merits of the claims, intellectual property claims are often time consuming, expensive to litigate or settle, and cause significant diversion of management attention..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: To the extent such intellectual property infringement claims are successful, they may have an adverse effect on our business, consolidated financial position, results of operations, or cash flows..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Our intellectual property rights are valuable, and any inability to protect them could reduce the value of our products, services, and brand..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Our patents, trademarks, trade secrets, copyrights, and other intellectual property rights are important assets for us..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Various events outside of our control pose a threat to our intellectual property rights, as well as to our products, services and technologies..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: For example, effective intellectual property protection may not be available in every country in which our products and services are distributed or made available through the Internet..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Although we seek to obtain patent protection for our innovations, it is possible we may not be able to protect some of these innovations..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Moreover , we may not have adequate patent or copyright protection for certain innovations that later turn out to be important..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Furthermore, there is always the possibility , despite our efforts, that the scope of the protection gained will be insuf ficient or that an issued patent may be deemed invalid or unenforceable..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: We also seek to maintain certain intellectual property as trade secrets..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: The secrecy could be compromised by outside parties, or by our employees, which could cause us to lose the competitive advantage resulting from these trade secrets..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: We also face risks associated with our trademarks..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: For example, there is a risk that the word “Google” could become so commonly used that it becomes synonymous with the word “search.” If this happens, we could lose protection for this trademark, which could result in other people using the word “Google” to refer to their own products, thus diminishing our brand..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Any significant impairment of our intellectual property rights could harm our business and our ability to compete..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Also, protecting our intellectual property rights is costly and time consuming..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Any increase in the unauthorized use of our intellectual property could make it more expensive to do business and harm our operating results..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: We may be subject to legal liability associated with providing online services or content..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: We host and provide a wide variety of services and products that enable users to exchange information, advertise products and services, conduct business, and engage in various online activities both domestically and internationally ..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: The law relating to the liability of providers of these online services and products for activities of their users is still somewhat unsettled both within the U.S..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: and internationally ..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Claims have been threatened and have been brought against us for defamation, negligence, breaches of contract, copyright or trademark infringement, unfair competition, unlawful activity , tort, including personal injury , fraud, or other theories based on the nature and content of information that we publish or to which we provide links or that may be posted online or generated by us or by third parties, including our users..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: In addition, we are and have been and may again in the future be subject to domestic or international actions 12alleging that certain content we have generated or third-party content that we have made available within our services violates U.S..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: We also arrange for the distribution of third-party advertisements to third-party publishers and advertising networks, and we offer third-party products, services, or content..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: We may be subject to claims concerning these products, services, or content by virtue of our involvement in marketing, branding, broadcasting, or providing access to them, even if we do not ourselves host, operate, provide, or provide access to these products, services, or content..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Defense of any such actions could be costly and involve significant time and attention of our management and other resources, may result in monetary liabilities or penalties, and may require us to change our business in an adverse manner ..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Privacy concerns relating to our technology could damage our reputation and deter current and potential users from using our products and services..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: From time to time, concerns have been expressed about whether our products, services, or processes compromise the privacy of users and others..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Concerns about our practices with regard to the collection, use, disclosure, or security of personal information or other privacy related matters, even if unfounded, could damage our reputation and adversely affect our operating results..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: In addition, as nearly all of our products and services are web-based, the amount of data we store for our users on our servers (including personal information) has been increasing..
sentences.label: negative

sentences.text: Any systems failure or compromise of our security that results in the release of our users’ data could seriously limit the adoption of our products and services, as well as harm our reputation and brand and, therefore, our business..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: We expect to continue to expend significant resources to protect against security breaches..
sentences.label: negative

sentences.text: The risk that these types of events could seriously harm our business is likely to increase as we expand the number of web-based products and services we offer, and operate in more countries..
sentences.label: negative

sentences.text: Regulatory authorities around the world are considering a number of legislative and regulatory proposals concerning data protection, including measures to ensure that our encryption of users’ data does not hinder law enforcement agencies’ access to that data..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: In addition, the interpretation and application of consumer and data protection laws in the U.S., Europe and elsewhere are often uncertain and in flux..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: It is possible that these laws may be interpreted and applied in a manner that is inconsistent with our data practices..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: If so, in addition to the possibility of fines, this could result in an order requiring that we change our data practices, which could have an adverse effect on our business and results of operations..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Complying with these various laws could cause us to incur substantial costs or require us to change our business practices in a manner adverse to our business..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: If our security measures are breached, or if our services are subject to attacks that degrade or deny the ability of users to access our products and services, our products and services may be perceived as not being secure, users and customers may curtail or stop using our products and services, and we may incur significant legal and financial exposure..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: We experience cyber attacks of varying degrees on a regular basis..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Our security measures may also be breached due to employee error, malfeasance, system errors or vulnerabilities, or otherwise..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Additionally , outside parties may attempt to fraudulently induce employees, users, or customers to disclose sensitive information in order to gain access to our data or our users’ or customers’ data..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Any such breach or unauthorized access could result in significant legal and financial exposure, damage to our reputation, and a loss of confidence in the security of our products and services that could potentially have an adverse effect on our business..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Because the techniques used to obtain unauthorized access, disable or degrade service, or sabotage systems change frequently and often are not recognized until launched against a target, we may be unable to anticipate these techniques or to implement adequate preventative measures..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: If an actual or perceived breach of our security occurs, the market perception of the effectiveness of our security measures could be harmed and we could lose users and customers..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: We face a number of manufacturing and supply chain risks that, if not properly managed, could adversely impact our financial results and prospects..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: We face a number of risks related to manufacturing and supply chain management..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: For instance, the products we sell may have quality issues resulting from the design or manufacture of the product, or from the software used in the product..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Sometimes, these issues may be caused by components we purchase from other manufacturers or 13suppliers..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: If the quality of our products does not meet our customers' expectations or our products are found to be defective, then our sales and operating earnings, and ultimately our reputation, could be negatively impacted..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: We rely on third parties to manufacture many of our assemblies and finished products, and we have third-party arrangements for the design of some components and parts..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Our business could be negatively affected if we are not able to engage third parties with the necessary capabilities or capacity on reasonable terms, or if those we engage fail to meet their obligations (whether due to financial difficulties or other reasons), or make adverse changes in the pricing or other material terms of our arrangements with them..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: We have in the past, and may experience in the future, supply shortages and price increases driven by raw material availability , manufacturing capacity , labor shortages, industry allocations, natural disasters and significant changes in the financial or business condition of our suppliers..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Workaround plans to address shortages could entail increased freight costs for expedited shipments..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: We may experience shortages or other supply chain disruptions in the future that could negatively impact our operations..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: In addition, some of the components we use in our products are available only from a single source or limited sources, and we may not be able to find replacement vendors on favorable terms or at all in the event of a supply chain disruption..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Additionally , because many of our supply contracts have volume-based pricing or minimum purchase requirements, if the volume of our hardware sales decreases or does not reach projected targets, we could face increased materials and manufacturing costs or other financial liabilities that could make our hardware products more costly per unit to manufacture and therefore less competitive and negatively impact our financial results..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Further , certain of our competitors may negotiate more favorable contractual terms based on volume and other commitments that may provide them with competitive advantages and may impact our supply ..
sentences.label: negative

sentences.text: We also require our suppliers and business partners to comply with law and company policies regarding workplace and employment practices, data security , environmental compliance and intellectual property licensing, but we do not control them or their practices..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: If any of them violates laws or implements practices regarded as unethical, we could experience supply chain disruptions, canceled orders, terminations of or damage to key relationships, and damage to our reputation..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: If any of them fails to procure necessary license rights to third-party intellectual property , legal action could ensue that could impact the saleability of our products and expose us to financial obligations to third parties..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: The Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act includes disclosure requirements regarding the use of certain minerals mined from the Democratic Republic of Congo and adjoining countries (DRC) and procedures pertaining to a manufacturer's efforts regarding the source of such minerals..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: SEC rules implementing these requirements may have the effect of reducing the pool of suppliers who can supply DRC “conflict free” components and parts, and we may not be able to obtain DRC conflict free products or supplies in sufficient quantities for our operations..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Since our supply chain is complex, we may face reputational challenges with our customers, stockholders and other stakeholders if we are unable to sufficiently verify the origins for the minerals used in our products..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Web spam and content farms could decrease our search quality , which could damage our reputation and deter our current and potential users from using our products and services..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: “Web spam” refers to websites that attempt to violate a search engine's quality guidelines or that otherwise seek to rank higher in search results than a search engine's assessment of their relevance and utility would rank them..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Although English-language web spam in our search results has been significantly reduced, and web spam in most other languages is limited, we expect web spammers will continue to seek ways to improve their rankings inappropriately ..
sentences.label: negative

sentences.text: We continuously combat web spam, including through indexing technology that makes it harder for spam-like, less useful web content to rank highly ..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: We face challenges from low-quality and irrelevant content websites, including “content farms”, which are websites that generate large quantities of low-quality content to help them improve their search rankings..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: We are continually launching algorithmic changes focused on low-quality websites..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: If our search results display an increasing number of web spam and content farms, this could hurt our reputation for delivering relevant information or reduce user traffic to our websites..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: In addition, as we continue to take actions to improve our search quality and reduce low-quality content, this may in the short run reduce our AdSense revenues, since some of these websites are AdSense partners..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Interruption or failure of our information technology and communications systems could hurt our ability to effectively provide our products and services, which could damage our reputation and harm our operating results..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: 14The availability of our products and services depends on the continuing operation of our information technology and communications systems..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Our systems are vulnerable to damage or interruption from earthquakes, terrorist attacks, floods, fires, power loss, telecommunications failures, computer viruses, computer denial of service attacks, or other attempts to harm our systems..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Some of our data centers are located in areas with a high risk of major earthquakes..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Our data centers are also subject to break-ins, sabotage, and intentional acts of vandalism, and to potential disruptions if the operators of certain of these facilities have financial difficulties..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Some of our systems are not fully redundant, and our disaster recovery planning cannot account for all eventualities..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: The occurrence of a natural disaster , a decision to close a facility we are using, or other unanticipated problems at our data centers could result in lengthy interruptions in our service..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: In addition, our products and services are highly technical and complex and may contain errors or vulnerabilities, which could result in interruptions in our services or the failure of our systems..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Our international operations expose us to additional risks that could harm our business, operating results, and financial condition..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Our international operations are significant to our revenues and net income, and we plan to continue to grow internationally ..
sentences.label: negative

sentences.text: International revenues accounted for approximately 57% of our consolidated revenues in 2014..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: In certain international markets, we have limited operating experience and may not benefit from any first-to-market advantages or otherwise succeed..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: In addition to risks described elsewhere in this section, our international operations expose us to other risks, including the following: • Changes in local political, economic, regulatory , social, and labor conditions, which may adversely harm our business..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: • Restrictions on foreign ownership and investments, and stringent foreign exchange controls that might prevent us from repatriating cash earned in countries outside the U.S..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Import and export requirements, tariffs, trade disputes and barriers, and customs classifications that may prevent us from offering products or providing services to a particular market and may increase our operating costs..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: • Longer payment cycles in some countries, increased credit risk, and higher levels of payment fraud..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: • Still developing foreign laws and legal systems..
sentences.label: negative

sentences.text: • Uncertainty regarding liability for services and content, including uncertainty as a result of local laws and lack of legal precedent..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: • Different employee/employer relationships, existence of workers' councils and labor unions, and other challenges caused by distance, language, and cultural differences, making it harder to do business in certain jurisdictions..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: In addition, compliance with complex foreign and U.S..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: laws and regulations that apply to our international operations increases our cost of doing business..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: These numerous and sometimes conflicting laws and regulations include internal control and disclosure rules, privacy and data protection requirements, anti-corruption laws, such as the U.S..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Foreign Corrupt Practices Act, and other local laws prohibiting corrupt payments to governmental officials, and competition regulations, among others..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Violations of these laws and regulations could result in fines and penalties, criminal sanctions against us, our officers, or our employees, prohibitions on the conduct of our business and on our ability to offer our products and services in one or more countries, and could also materially affect our brand, our international growth efforts, our ability to attract and retain employees, our business, and our operating results..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Although we have implemented policies and procedures designed to ensure compliance with these laws and regulations, there can be no assurance that our employees, contractors, or agents will not violate our policies..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Finally , since we conduct business in currencies other than U.S..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: dollars but report our financial results in U.S..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: dollars, we face exposure to fluctuations in currency exchange rates..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Although we hedge a portion of our international currency exposure, significant fluctuations in exchange rates between the U.S..
sentences.label: negative

sentences.text: dollar and foreign currencies may 15adversely affect our revenues and earnings..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Additionally , hedging programs are inherently risky and could expose us to additional risks that could adversely affect our financial condition and results of operations..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Our operating results may fluctuate, which makes our results difficult to predict and could cause our results to fall short of expectations..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Our operating results may fluctuate as a result of a number of factors, many outside of our control..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: As a result, comparing our operating results on a period-to-period basis may not be meaningful, and you should not rely on our past results as an indication of our future performance..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Our quarterly , year-to-date, and annual expenses as a percentage of our revenues may differ significantly from our historical or projected rates..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Our operating results in future quarters may fall below expectations..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Any of these events could cause our stock price to fall..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Each of the risk factors listed in this section in addition to the following factors may affect our operating results: • Our ability to continue to attract users to our websites and retain existing users on our websites..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Our ability to monetize (or generate revenues from) traffic on Google websites and our Google Network Members' websites both on desktop and mobile devices..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Revenue fluctuations caused by changes in property mix, platform mix, and geographical mix..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: • The amount of revenues and expenses generated and incurred in currencies other than U.S..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: dollars, and our ability to manage the resulting risk through our foreign exchange risk management program..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • The amount and timing of operating costs and expenses and capital expenditures related to the maintenance and expansion of our businesses, operations, and infrastructure..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Our focus on long-term goals over short-term results..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • The results of our acquisitions and our investments in risky projects, including new businesses, products, services, and technologies..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Our ability to keep our websites operational at a reasonable cost and without service interruptions..
sentences.label: negative

sentences.text: • Our ability to generate significant revenues from new products and services in which we have invested considerable time and resources..
sentences.label: negative

sentences.text: Because our business is changing and evolving, our historical operating results may not be useful to you in predicting our future operating results..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: In addition, advertising spending has historically been cyclical in nature, reflecting overall economic conditions, as well as budgeting and buying patterns..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Also, user traffic tends to be seasonal..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Our rapid growth has tended to mask the cyclicality and seasonality of our business..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: As our growth rate has slowed, the cyclicality and seasonality in our business has become more pronounced and caused our operating results to fluctuate..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: If we were to lose the services of Larry , Sergey , Eric, or other key personnel, we may not be able to execute our business strategy ..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Our future success depends in a large part upon the continued service of key members of our senior management team..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: In particular , Larry Page and Sergey Brin are critical to the overall management of Google and the development of our technology ..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Along with our Executive Chairman Eric E..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Schmidt, they also play a key role in maintaining our culture and setting our strategic direction..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: All of our executive officers and key employees are at-will employees, and we do not maintain any key-person life insurance policies..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: The loss of key personnel could seriously harm our business..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: We rely on highly skilled personnel and, if we are unable to retain or motivate key personnel, hire qualified personnel, or maintain our corporate culture, we may not be able to grow effectively ..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Our performance largely depends on the talents and efforts of highly skilled individuals..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Our future success depends on our continuing ability to identify , hire, develop, motivate, and retain highly skilled personnel for all areas of our organization..
sentences.label: negative

sentences.text: Competition in our industry for qualified employees is intense, and certain of our competitors have directly targeted our employees..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: In addition, our compensation arrangements, such as our equity award programs, may not always be successful in attracting new employees and retaining and motivating our existing employees..
sentences.label: negative

sentences.text: Our 16continued ability to compete effectively depends on our ability to attract new employees and to retain and motivate our existing employees..
sentences.label: negative

sentences.text: In addition, we believe that our corporate culture fosters innovation, creativity , and teamwork..
sentences.label: negative

sentences.text: As our organization grows, and we are required to implement more complex organizational management structures, we may find it increasingly difficult to maintain the beneficial aspects of our corporate culture..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: This could negatively impact our future success..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Our business depends on continued and unimpeded access to the Internet by us and our users..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Internet access providers may be able to restrict, block, degrade, or charge for access to certain of our products and services, which could lead to additional expenses and the loss of users and advertisers..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Our products and services depend on the ability of our users to access the Internet, and certain of our products require significant bandwidth to work effectively ..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Currently , this access is provided by companies that have significant market power in the broadband and internet access marketplace, including incumbent telephone companies, cable companies, mobile communications companies, and government-owned service providers..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Some of these providers have taken, or have stated that they may take measures, including legal actions, that could degrade, disrupt, or increase the cost of user access to certain of our products by restricting or prohibiting the use of their infrastructure to support or facilitate our offerings, or by charging increased fees to us or our users to provide our offerings..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: In addition, in some jurisdictions, our products and services have been subject to government-initiated restrictions or blockages..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Such interference could result in a loss of existing users and advertisers, and increased costs, and could impair our ability to attract new users and advertisers, thereby harming our revenues and growth..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: New technologies could block online ads, which would harm our business..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Technologies have been developed that can block the display of our ads and that provide tools to users to opt out of our advertising products..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Most of our revenues are derived from fees paid to us by advertisers in connection with the display of ads on web pages for our users..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: As a result, such technologies and tools could adversely affect our operating results..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: We are exposed to fluctuations in the market values of our investments..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Given the global nature of our business, we have investments both domestically and internationally ..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Credit ratings and market values of these investments can be negatively impacted by liquidity , credit deterioration or losses, financial results, or other factors..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: As a result, the value or liquidity of our cash equivalents and marketable securities could decline and result in a material impairment, which could materially adversely affect our financial condition and operating results..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: We may have exposure to greater than anticipated tax liabilities..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Our future income taxes could be adversely affected by earnings being lower than anticipated in jurisdictions that have lower statutory tax rates and higher than anticipated in jurisdictions that have higher statutory tax rates, the net gains and losses recognized by legal entities on certain hedges and related hedged intercompany and other transactions under our foreign exchange risk management program, changes in the valuation of our deferred tax assets or liabilities, or changes in tax laws, regulations, or accounting principles, as well as certain discrete items..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: We are subject to regular review and audit by both domestic and foreign tax authorities..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: As a result, we have received, and may in the future receive, assessments in multiple jurisdictions on various tax-related assertions, including transfer pricing adjustments or permanent establishment..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Any adverse outcome of such a review or audit could have a negative effect on our operating results and financial condition..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: In addition, the determination of our worldwide provision for income taxes and other tax liabilities requires significant judgment, and there are many transactions and calculations where the ultimate tax determination is uncertain..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Although we believe our estimates are reasonable, the ultimate tax outcome may differ from the amounts recorded in our financial statements and may materially affect our financial results in the period or periods for which such determination is made..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Risks Related to Ownership of Our Stock The trading price for our Class A common stock may continue to be volatile and the trading price for our newly distributed non-voting Class C capital stock may also be volatile.17The trading price of our stock has at times experienced substantial price volatility and may continue to be volatile..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: For example, from January 1, 2014 through December 31, 2014, the closing price of our Class A common stock, retroactively adjusted as if the Stock Split occurred on January 1, 2014, ranged from $498.16 per share to $610.70 per share, and from April 3, 2014 through December 31, 2014, the closing price of our Class C capital stock ranged from $495.39 to $596.08 per share..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: In addition, following the settlement of litigation involving the authorization to distribute our non-voting Class C capital stock, our board of directors approved a distribution of shares of Class C capital stock as a dividend to our holders of Class A and Class B common stock with a payment date of April 2, 2014, and on April 3, 2014, Class C capital stock was listed on The NASDAQ Global Select Market..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: In accordance with the settlement, we may be obligated to make a payment to holders of Class C capital stock if, on average, Class C capital stock trades below Class A common stock during the first 365 days following the first date the Class C capital stock trades..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: If such a payment is required, it must be made to holders of the Class C stock in cash, Class A stock, Class C stock, or a combination thereof, at the discretion of the board of directors..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Over time, we cannot reliably predict what, if any, patterns will emerge with respect to the relative trading prices of Class A common stock and Class C capital stock..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: The trading price of our Class A common stock and Class C capital stock may fluctuate widely in response to various factors, some of which are beyond our control..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: These factors include, among others: • Quarterly variations in our results of operations or those of our competitors..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: • Announcements by us or our competitors of acquisitions, new products, significant contracts, commercial relationships, or capital commitments..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Recommendations by securities analysts or changes in earnings estimates..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Announcements about our earnings that are not in line with analyst expectations, the risk of which is enhanced because it is our policy not to give guidance on earnings..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Announcements by our competitors of their earnings that are not in line with analyst expectations..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: • Commentary by industry and market professionals about our products, strategies, and other matters affecting our business and results, regardless of its accuracy ..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • The volume of shares of Class A common stock and Class C capital stock available for public sale..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Sales of Class A common stock and Class C capital stock by us or by our stockholders (including sales by our directors, executive officers, and other employees)..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Short sales, hedging, and other derivative transactions on shares of our Class A common stock and Class C capital stock..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • The perceived values of Class A common stock and Class C capital stock relative to one another ..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: In addition, the stock market in general, and the market for technology companies in particular , have experienced extreme price and volume fluctuations that have often been unrelated or disproportionate to the operating performance of those companies..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: These broad market and industry factors may harm the market price of our Class A common stock and our Class C capital stock regardless of our actual operating performance..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: The concentration of our stock ownership limits our stockholders’ ability to influence corporate matters..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Our Class B common stock has 10 votes per share, our Class A common stock has one vote per share, and our Class C capital stock has no voting rights..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: As of December 31, 2014, Larry , Sergey , and Eric beneficially owned approximately 92.5% of our outstanding Class B common stock, which represented approximately 60.1% of the voting power of our outstanding capital stock..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Larry , Sergey , and Eric therefore have significant influence over management and affairs and over all matters requiring stockholder approval, including the election of directors and significant 18corporate transactions, such as a merger or other sale of our company or our assets, for the foreseeable future..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: In addition, because our Class C capital stock carries no voting rights (except as required by applicable law), the issuance of the Class C capital stock, including in future stock-based acquisition transactions and to fund employee equity incentive programs, could prolong the duration of Larry and Sergey’ s current relative ownership of our voting power and their ability to elect all of our directors and to determine the outcome of most matters submitted to a vote of our stockholders..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Together with Eric, they would also continue to be able to control any required stockholder vote with respect to certain change in control transactions involving Google (including an acquisition of Google by another company)..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: This concentrated control limits or severely restricts our stockholders’ ability to influence corporate matters and, as a result, we may take actions that our stockholders do not view as beneficial..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: As a result, the market price of our Class A common stock and our Class C capital stock could be adversely affected..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Provisions in our charter documents and under Delaware law could discourage a takeover that stockholders may consider favorable..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Provisions in our certificate of incorporation and bylaws may have the effect of delaying or preventing a change of control or changes in our management..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: These provisions include the following: • Our certificate of incorporation provides for a tri-class capital stock structure..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: As a result of this structure, Larry , Sergey , and Eric have significant influence over all matters requiring stockholder approval, including the election of directors and significant corporate transactions, such as a merger or other sale of our company or our assets..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: This concentrated control could discourage others from initiating any potential merger , takeover , or other change of control transaction that other stockholders may view as beneficial..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: As noted above, the issuance of the Class C capital stock could have the effect of prolonging the influence of Larry , Sergey , and Eric..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Our board of directors has the right to elect directors to fill a vacancy created by the expansion of the board of directors or the resignation, death, or removal of a director , which prevents stockholders from being able to fill vacancies on our board of directors..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: • Our stockholders may not act by written consent..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: As a result, a holder , or holders, controlling a majority of our capital stock would not be able to take certain actions without holding a stockholders' meeting..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Our certificate of incorporation prohibits cumulative voting in the election of directors..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: This limits the ability of minority stockholders to elect director candidates..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Stockholders must provide advance notice to nominate individuals for election to the board of directors or to propose matters that can be acted upon at a stockholders’ meeting..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: These provisions may discourage or deter a potential acquirer from conducting a solicitation of proxies to elect the acquirer's own slate of directors or otherwise attempting to obtain control of our company ..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Our board of directors may issue, without stockholder approval, shares of undesignated preferred stock..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: The ability to issue undesignated preferred stock makes it possible for our board of directors to issue preferred stock with voting or other rights or preferences that could impede the success of any attempt to acquire us..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: As a Delaware corporation, we are also subject to certain Delaware anti-takeover provisions..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Under Delaware law, a corporation may not engage in a business combination with any holder of 15% or more of its outstanding voting stock unless the holder has held the stock for three years or, among other things, the board of directors has approved the transaction..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Our board of directors could rely on Delaware law to prevent or delay an acquisition of us..
sentences.label: positive
